name: Tonies
description:
Every instrument has its own sound. Have you ever wondered how this sound is made? 

Join the battle of becoming the best sound out there. Fight with your friends to show them, you know the best beat.

2-4 Player game. Controller supported.

Credits:

  • Dana van der Wal, Designer
  • Dave Ruptash, Programmer
  • Joris van Hugten, Artist
  • Luca Quartesan, Programmer
  • Miroslav Harant, Artist/Sound
